description:
Welcome to this Three Sixty Academy course exclusive to Udemy.

Here with Three Sixty Academy you can study online towards making your YouTube Channel create a larger impact.

Our course is comprised of 5 sections all focused on helping you create a stronger YouTube presence.

  • Introduction
  • Using YouTube For Marketing
  • Maximise Your Reach On YouTube
  • Conclusion
  • Bonus Lectures

    • More than enough to turn that YouTube Channel of yours from zero to hero, using our proactive and practical approach backed up with real life examples.

    Good luck and we hope you enjoy our course!

    Please note: This is an introductory course.
title: Marketing on YouTube
